document.masterDocTitle: Species of the genus Galathea Fabricius, 1793 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Galatheidae) from the Indian and Pacific Oceans, with descriptions of 92 new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Species of the genus Galathea Fabricius, 1793 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Galatheidae) from the Indian and Pacific Oceans, with descriptions of 92 new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Galathea raventosae Macpherson, 2012 : 418
, figs. 4, 6A ( New Caledonia , Vanuatu , 180–270 m ).

Material examined . Philippines . MUSORSTOM 2 , Stn DR33,
13° 32 'N
,
121 °07'E
, 120–137 m ,
24 November 1980
: 1 F 3.7 mm (MNHN-IU- 2013-13824 ). MUSORSTOM 3 , Stn CP124, 12°03'N ,
121 ° 35 'E
, 120–123 m ,
4 June 1985
: 1 ov. F 4.2 mm (MNHN-IU- 2013-13823 ); 6 ov. F 4.0– 4.5 mm (MNHN-IU- 2013-13986 ).

Solomon Islands . SALOMON 1 , Stn CP1761,
8° 46.535 'S
,
160 °01.604'E
, 191–290 m ,
27 September 2001
: 1 M 4.9 mm , 1 ov. F 4.0 mm (MNHN-IU- 2013-13828 ).

Remarks. The genetic divergences between
G. raventosae
and other species are always larger than 10.0% ( COI ) and 4.0% ( 16 S rRNA). The closest relative is
G. balssi
( COI , 10.7 % and 16 S rRNA, 4.2 %).
